results.name: Lexicographic ordering of M x M x M, where M={0,1,2,...}.
comment: See A057557 for N x N x N, where N={1,2,3,...}.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10962
example: Flatten the list of ordered lattice points, (0,0,0) < (0,0,1) < (0,1,0) < ... to 0,0,0, 0,0,1, 0,1,0, ...
